name: places_near_place
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geodb_cities.
Tool description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
API description: Retrieve places near a specified place, with optional filtering criteria.

placeid.description: The ID of the place from which to find nearby places.

radius.description: The location radius within which to find places

asciimode.description: Whether to display results using ASCII characters.

languagecode.description: The language in which to display results.

includedeleted.description: Whether to include places marked as deleted. Options: 'ALL', 'SINCE_YESTERDAY', 'SINCE_LAST_WEEK', 'NONE'.

minpopulation.description: Minimum population of the places to be included in the results.

distanceunit.description: The unit of distance to use ('MI' for miles, 'KM' for kilometers).

sort.description: The sorting criteria for results. Format: Â±SORT_FIELD, where SORT_FIELD could be 'countryCode', 'elevation', 'name', 'population'.

hateoasmode.description: Whether to include HATEOAS-style links in the results.

nameprefixdefaultlangresults.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested

nameprefix.description: Only places whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

types.description: Filter places by these types (comma-separated values such as 'ADM2', 'CITY', 'ISLAND').

countryids.description: Only include places in these countries (comma-separated country codes or WikiData IDs).

timezoneids.description: Only include places in these time zones.

excludedcountryids.description: Exclude places in these countries (comma-separated country codes or WikiData IDs).

offset.description: The offset into the results set for pagination.

maxpopulation.description: Maximum population of the places to be included in the results.
